description.p: Extract the day number of the week from a date or datetime value.
Returns the day number of the week from a date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The DayOfWeek function extracts the day number of the week from a date or datetime value.

example.caption: DayOfWeek() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, DayOfWeek(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|5
